org.jscsi.parser.datasegment

Class DataSegmentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jscsi.parser.datasegment.DataSegmentFactory

  • public final class DataSegmentFactory
extends Object

    DataSegmentFactory

    This factory creates a instance to a DataSegment object.

    Author:
    Volker Wildi

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DataSegmentFactory.DataSegmentFormat
      This enumeration defines the valid stati of the data segment.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static final IDataSegment create(ByteBuffer buffer,
                  DataSegmentFactory.DataSegmentFormat format,
                  int maxChunkSize)
        Creates a data segment of the given format and with the given chunk size (in bytes). This data segment is initialized with the data of buffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The initialization buffer.
        format - A format from the DataSegmentFormat enumeration.
        maxChunkSize - The size (in bytes) of one chunk, which represents the MaxRecvDataSegmentLength .
        Returns:
        The instance of an DataSegment object.

      • create

        public static final IDataSegment create(ByteBuffer buffer,
                  int position,
                  int length,
                  DataSegmentFactory.DataSegmentFormat format,
                  int maxChunkSize)
        Creates a data segment of the given format and with the given chunk size (in bytes). This data segment is initialized with the data of buffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The initialization buffer.
        position - The position of the variable buffer.
        length - The length (in bytes) to read from buffer.
        format - A format from the DataSegmentFormat enumeration.
        maxChunkSize - The size (in bytes) of one chunk, which represents the MaxRecvDataSegmentLength .
        Returns:
        The instance of an DataSegment object.

      • create

        public static final IDataSegment create(DataSegmentFactory.DataSegmentFormat format,
                  int maxChunkSize)
        Creates a data segment of the given format and with the given chunk size (in bytes).
        Parameters:
        format - A format from the DataSegmentFormat enumeration.
        maxChunkSize - The size (in bytes) of one chunk, which represents the MaxRecvDataSegmentLength .
        Returns:
        The instance of an DataSegment object.
